edu.sjsu.cs.cs151.controller

Class GameInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.sjsu.cs.cs151.controller.GameInfo

  • public class GameInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    This class gets information from Model and stores it for display. It is then used to display information set in classes from the view.
    Author:
    Arman Sandher, Redjay

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameInfo(Model model)
      Game View object in Controller to keep all the inforamtion in Model.
